website_summaries.verdict: Reliable and powerful, this generator sits at the top of the price point for room-sized ozone generators.
pros: Removes cigarette smoke odors within minutes and handles strong odors well, too
cons: Timer is troublesome, malfunctioning for some users and causing the generator to run longer than intended
Fan can run very loud, especially after a few months of use
Installing ceramic filters can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Just had a problem... Quick response!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 6 weeks ago. I was loving it.... It worked great! Then today it started making a horrible screeching sound. I sent a note to Green Air Purifiers. Jonathan responded within a few hours with a solution! Right now things are back to normal. I'm confident if I have another problem I will receive the same quick response. This machine has taken the "dust" floaters out of the air... I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: homefront1

customer_reviews.title: If you want your home to smell fresh and clean then buy this air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier is a must for anyone with allergies, asthma or pets. Which I have all three... From the moment I turned it on my home smells like a fresh spring day. Even the furniture smells amazing. Also removes cooking odors immediately. No more waking up in the middle of the night and smelling last night’s dinner. We have a 2800 sq ft home and I have it running downstairs and my upstairs smells just as fresh! The air purifier is well built and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really needed an all-around use air cleaner, this is perfect for all my needs. Ion, HEPA, sterilization, and Ozone for odor elimination when necessary. This has all your wishes in one box! When you are hyper-sensitive with allergies and your living arrangements aren't perfect. The only go to that will work is this one! Grateful this product exists as this makes my life more manageable while I have to share air with my neighbor who smokes inside their home and cooks things that I loathe the smell of and the free-breeze, oh my. THANKS! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: The Meander

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: JB Innovative Products has exceptional customer service and an exceptional air purifier. Our "Green Machine" produces noticeably cleaner air throughout our home and even on our partially-enclosed lanai, where we allow smoking outside. We use it regularly a couple times a month in all of our rooms -- bedrooms, bathrooms, kitchen/dining area, and living room. Friends and neighbors visit a lot and notice the cleanliness of the air. We even put it in the back of our SUV for an hour or so and it removes all odors. We like the product enough that this is our second machine! We had some minor fan noise issues, and received very quick replies to our inquiries; the machine now works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I used the machine for about a year to do this review (typically everything is great when brand new). Almost a year later and I can say without hesitation I absolutely love this machine! My son will be getting one this Christmas for his family.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Month later
customer_reviews.text: Works great, works quickly. I feel like our air is cleaner and more breathable, while also knowing our home's air is in fact more fresh and clean smelling. We have a moisture issue in our basement, in the winter our furnace sends too much of that moisture and basement odor into the living area above, by the second day of running the house had no odor. I really appreciate the fact it doesn't have to be on Ozone all the time. This is a great little piece of equipment for any home any size I say. Might need two however if you're home is too large. Well worth the try
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great Purifier & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years, the ozone function works great to eliminate bad odors. Recently put the plates back in slightly wet and blew the board. Called the co. in Ca, said it could be the plates or the transformer, purchased plates, ozone still didn't work. Purchased a new transformer (they comped me for the plates) & they threw in a free board..just in case. Fired it up & it now works great. Customer service was amazing, would definitely purchase from buygreenair.com again or their products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: acustomer

customer_reviews.title: Our home smells great now!
customer_reviews.text: We use a wood stove for heat and the puff of smoke when the door on the lit stove is opened is very annoying. The smoke drifts through the house, resulting in the home, furniture and clothing smelling like a campfire. After I purchased this air cleaner the difference was like night and day. You could actually see the smoke dissipating quickly and the whole house smelled much better. I turn it up at night and everything smells fresh in the morning. AND we can all breathe much more easily! If it works for heavy wood smoke just think what it would do for normal household odors!
customer_reviews.author: Calinda Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: No better than cheap ones
customer_reviews.text: I have used purifiers for many years and have bought as cheap as$160. I will honestly say this one is no better than the cheap ones. This u nt did not last a year before the fan went out. They were good to send a replacement fan. Right after the year was up you could no longer smell the ozone smell. I may as well have bought another cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: lois

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I had a mold problem that would not respond to regular remedies. One application of Ozone took care of the problem. My allergy no longer suffers. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this product so far
customer_reviews.text: Had one a few years ago. When I bought it they sent (2) extra plates. It was nice. I could clean and dry one set while the other was in operation. Since your company didn't send 2 extra plates, what would be the cost for 2 additional? So far this machine is what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Cleans air fast and reliably.
customer_reviews.text: This product has everything we need: O3, UV, Negative ions, air purifying. Yes, it is loud. The noise level is comparable to its work load = normal. The price is unbeatable for this hard working product. I recommend this machine over all other air purifiers I have owned. This one is the least expensive and has been running 24/7 for over 2 months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Zap

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big house
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice air purifier I can tell when it's been running in my house the air is alot fresher it requires regular cleaning like anything but it's pretty friendly to take apart to clean I have had mine about a year now and i don't think it's been off but once a month to clean it very sturdy couldn't be happier especially during flu season
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Clean, crisp air
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for clean, crisp air in my house. I have had an older, used product for years until it finally gave up the ghost. I've been wanting the green air product for a long time and finally stepped up and purchased it. It arrived several days ahead of eta. Professionally packed, easy to install and turn on. I hope I get many great years with this new air/ozone purifier.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine leaves air clean & sanitizet settibg leaves air crisp I even sleep better with use of machine. Every bit worth the buy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Technology based
customer_reviews.text: Is this the same technology they used in bars in the 80's and 90's? When I worked it would be thick as fog and they turned them on and 30 minutes later it was clean. I was a singer at the time and the ozone didn't affect me at all. I think. It's a Great Machine. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMB

customer_reviews.title: An Effective Air Purifier with great results!
customer_reviews.text: I totally like this product and used if at a NH Realtor for challenging homes with air quality issues! It has been most effective in removing odors such as: smoking/nicotine; burned food; musty basements and mold. I have also purchased a unit for our personal use sharing it with family and friends. Currently it is being used to remove intense skunk spray odors in a home!
customer_reviews.author: Everett "Skip" Gilman

customer_reviews.title: 18 months motor burned out
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive machine and one would expect longer use. This morning it was running and the motor just burned out in front of me. Not suggested ! ********UPDATE******* This company went above and beyond any company I’ve ever worked with to resolve my product issue! In addition to returning my calls after hours and weekends and Upon receiving my complaint ,they IMMEDIATELY SENT A NEW MACHINE. The machine is awesome, we’ve always loved the machine and missed it while it was down. Don’t hesitate to buy, they won’t let you down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is a noisy unit and felt that it did nothing with the air. It certainly isn't an ionic unit.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’ve had it for three months and it is easy to use, really does it’s job and it is fairly quiet. It hides the doggy odor and lowers allergens. So glad to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Day

customer_reviews.title: Ozone function quit working after7 months
customer_reviews.text: This was great until the ozone function quit working. I can no longer get any ozone odor from the unit. It worked for about 7 months and then malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome machine. It does smell as if your house ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. It does smell as if your house was bleached. And I believe it does what the manufacturer says it does. Get one can't go wrong. I don't smoke but other things are in the air and it zaps them.
customer_reviews.author: RevBobH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new house, and when we moved in, we found the living room smelled like wet dog, so we bought one of these and now there is no odor in the room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: thetravelczarina

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased a few of these units and love them. One unit went bad however. When I contacted customer service they were great at helping me troubleshoot and then replaced the unit for me. Way to stand behind your products!
customer_reviews.author: melinda smith

customer_reviews.title: Instant results
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment complex. When I gained some new neighbors, I immediately noticed their smoking habit because my unit was filled with the scent. The Green Air Pro 2 took care of the issues!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: ... these units for four years and couldn't be more pleased. Buying another as a Christmas present for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned two of these units for four years and couldn't be more pleased. Buying another as a Christmas present for my son. Does the job. Customer support available and helpful stand behind the product. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Jaworowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job cleaning the air. I am a smoker and since I started using the Green Air you would never know I smoked. Makes the whole house smell fresh. I just love this product. I just hope the replacement filters are easy to get.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this was going to big enough to clean the air like others but it is perfect. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purifier and even better customer support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purifier and even better customer support. Upon unpacking I had installed the filters wrong. I emailed support and received a response right away. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping for a great product. I live in a home from the 1850's and it does a great job at removing the smells that come along with older homes. I live next to a main thoroughfare which brings a great amount of dust into the house when I open the windows. This unit captures the dust. Used this product for four months now and with a little routine cleaning this machine has worked flawlessly. Customer service was fast with answers to my questions. Within 15 minuets I had a response to my email. I have purchased four other brands and this is the best unit by far for reliability. I will not hesitate to purchase another model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smethers

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This purifier works just as advertised, and leaves the house with the clean scent, created by the Ozone. I've used this to removed a mildew smell in a boat and cigarette odor in cars, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Product
customer_reviews.text: I have it installed in a smoking room in my home. Works very well. More importantly the company stands by there product. Purchasing replacement filters and plates is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Newman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Service
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months my remote control was not working properly. I phoned the company and after a few questions they promptly sent me a replacement remote. They were easily contacted by phone and there was no automated nonsense about pushing this or that number to talk to someone. They actually phoned me back as I initially called outside their open hours.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Miller

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to clean up stinking mold smell from an old house. It seemed like it did the job, though we weren't expecting miracles. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rumely

customer_reviews.title: This Machine is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine for it is all that I need rolled into one. I was having mold issues in my crawl space in my townhome and the ozone machine has eradicated the mold issue completely! I have used "commercial" ozone machines and this one is as good as those but I now can use the other features along with it to keep my home air at the best possible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up; very effective in cleaning the air; easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: You can easily adjust intensity of cleaning mechanism and size capacity--from 600 sq. ft. to 3000 sq ft. Air purifier I had this good,( bought 12 years ago) cost me $1,000. I like this one so much, I gifted one to friend who had mold problems. Great product at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to tell if filter is working... ...
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to tell if filter is working.... followed directions as many ways as possible... The companion filter is a SHAM... DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: lew richey

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to furnace filter additions
customer_reviews.text: Product works great occasionally I have to unplug it and replug it back in to get it to power on and haven’t figured out why yet but it’s extremely fast and efficient on all it’s functions
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: good clean air
customer_reviews.text: seems to be working well. haven't tried it out yet to company. we like it....I keep having trouble with the timer. I set it to shut off and try to set it to turn on but it don't turn on so I'm still playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Gina M Dettman

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Well built unit with adjustable ozone level for size of room it will be used in. Has a timer built in so as to turn the ozone generator off but still have the fan and filter running 24/7. We have it running next to the air conditioner return air vent for 30 mins a day and the house is smelling much fresher.
customer_reviews.author: D. D

customer_reviews.title: Got my moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. Less expensive than the Alpine I previously owned also.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN H. CARTER III

customer_reviews.title: Green air pro
customer_reviews.text: Don’t work can’t use so I don’t know how it is 😩
customer_reviews.author: Raimo Hallikainen

customer_reviews.title: No more sinus problems!
customer_reviews.text: The constant sneezing has stopped. We really love this air purifier. It is so great to not be miserable anymore. A small price to pay and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: chris holland

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start off by saying This air purifier really does the trick. I have a black lab and let's face it dogs stink and when I run the ozone on this machine it does.the trick. As far as how simple it is to run yes its very simple and very well built. I would highly recommend this machine and this company very quick and had shipped out right away to my house. My mother spent about 600 dollars for her unit and it doesn't even compare to this. You wont go wrong with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: robby

customer_reviews.title: It is easy
customer_reviews.text: I have had another ozone air cleaner prior to this one. The previous ozone cleaner was considerably more $$$ and not as easy to navigate through. I actually called this company and they answer the phone and they are glad to help. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steve Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Green Air Pro 2 Plte HEPA Alpine Purifier Ozone Generator for our office. So far it works great and we love it! It definitely helps eliminate odors in the air and makes the room smell good! We are happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wedel

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, 2 cats and a teenage boy! Says it all
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great product- great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful air purifier. Customer support is great. I have spoken with Jonathan at Customer Service department several times, and they're top notch people. Great product, great support, solid company. I highly recommend! James
customer_reviews.author: MKC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for musky, moldy workshops
customer_reviews.text: Pro is good but noisy and does NOT have the PCO\RCI cell technology. It has 2 purification plates which works great when you're away from the house. Perfect for musky workshops.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson Smith

customer_reviews.title: filters smoke like a boss! +love Anion
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this little unit. My wife has MCS (multi-chemical-sensativity) and this has done an excellent job of making our home a haven, during the fire and smoke months in oregon! I hope the replacement hepa filters are inexpensive, that will be very telling indeed! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tecman

customer_reviews.title: Green Air Pri 2
customer_reviews.text: This has helped clear the mold and air in our home
customer_reviews.author: Sandra lesewski

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AIR PURIFIER
customer_reviews.text: Great air purifier!! Very happy with quality and results. Product came as described. Very fast shipping! Excellent seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: True Focus Health Association

customer_reviews.title: which was great for 6 years
customer_reviews.text: A little loud, but works flawlessly!!! Had to replace my microlux, which was great for 6 years, but died because of my fault. This one is already doing its jobbeen running 2 days, and no sneezing!!' Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations! Cleared cigar smoke immediately. Positioned in ...
customer_reviews.text: Beyond expectations! Cleared cigar smoke immediately. Positioned in the basement when I left home and it cleared basement and second floor. The house was built in 1926. It removed musty smell and I run it only 2 hours a day. I also stopped having trouble with kitchen odors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cigarette smoke and paint fumes!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small house that had been smoked in heavily and then sat vacant for several months. This unit did a very good job of subduing the smoke odor and is doing an excellent job against the paint fumes.
customer_reviews.author: Realvinster

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It does what it says it does. Customer service is the best I've ever experienced with a manufacturer. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new house that had some musty odors. Has a nice UV light feature and a HEPA filter. You can turn the ozone on a timer for when you leave the house. Only negative comment is that the instructions are hard to follow and the timer is not really easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Clears the air when its Smokey or smelly right now when purify turned on. Very efficient love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mongillo

customer_reviews.title: Green air pro
customer_reviews.text: When I first recieved this product when I turned the fan on high it pulled the fan back and began hitting the frame.But it was an easy fix.I compressed the metal ring and it works great now.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to Texas and my family and I have been suffering from allergies. We noticed a difference within 24 hours. I had a purifier from another company and there is no comparison.The Green Air Pro 2 is far superior to the one I previously owned. It has also been effective in eliminating cooking and cat box odor. The seller was very prompt in answering my questions when I contacted him and the customer service was great. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air purifier
customer_reviews.text: The Green Air provides me with everything I wanted in this product. It is compact, but mighty in the clean air it provides. I am very satisfied with its quality and operation. I would buy another one and recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S. Ditton

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, you can smell the difference in the air. I wish it was a little quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laino

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It works exactly as described. Glad I bought it. Good looking quality product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it.They are so very helpful when it stops working. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our guest house. Enjoy the clean smell and how it covers the 1200 sq ft.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Have had mine for over two years now. Probably long enough to form an opinion. Couldn't live without it. Works really, really well and takes almost no space. Quiet and aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: cathie

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth air purifier from this company over the last25 years. Repeat customer! I run them 24-7 and they do a tremendous job!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this air purifier... Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this air cleaner quite a few years now. Have had no problems... I set it beside litter box. It works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 6 of these for 3 households. They work very well. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: In this day and age it is amazing to get a product and service that outperforms all expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. A louder than expected but still great

customer_reviews.title: I am lovin it!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't dusted in 2 weeks. OH, because I don't need to. And my house smells so clean too. I love this air machine!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best one I ever had, so far. As long as it holds up.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! This is a great product and the service we received from this company was exemplary, we highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Why it makes terrible smell, either sterilization mode or purify mode
customer_reviews.text: Why it makes terrible smell , either sterilization mode or purify mode ! I thought the machine needed to be worn off something but after a month it still makes that terrible smell ! I don't know if the tiny fan is strong enough to to suck the dust cuz under the sun light I can see dust flying around but it seems like it doesnot get sucked in ! Please give me a feed back ! ??? I don't know , I'm not satisfied not happy ! First time buying through Amazon but not good !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Model Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Green Air Pros. This model has better functionality than previous models. Excellent for home or office use.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good machine.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very quite and takes away odor of the house from older carpets and furnitures. I turn it on as soon as I come home and smell fresh air. It is a good machine.

customer_reviews.title: Very good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product has done an amazing job at eliminating not only pet odors but everyday odors. This was a great purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Eliminated odors within 24 hours. Strong temporary ozone odor initially but that also improved

customer_reviews.text: Only been using this product for a little over a week but it is amazing! My house smells so fresh and clean. Would recommend this product to anyone!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Yet, we need better instructions on inserting parts sent in box
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend to reduce dust and animal dander
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I don't have pets. But my mother in law has a dog and my daughter has a cat; they live with us. Hubby developed a cough and I had tickly throats at night. We purchased this unit and that very night it made a difference. Hubby's cough has lessened and I don't need to keep cough drops on the night stand anymore. Definitely recommend to reduce dust and animal dander.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Richter

customer_reviews.title: Almost a year
customer_reviews.text: Got this in July 2012 and so far it has been a great product. Previously had an Ecoquest Fresh Air but that died after years. This has been a good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: K. Merrick

customer_reviews.title: AirPro Green Purifier
customer_reviews.text: I like the air purifier. The instructions failed to mentionhow to clean the three filters.It mentioned the ceramic plate but nothing on the others. It does what it saysit will do. Itis very quiet.It does take the odors out as stated.
customer_reviews.author: spence

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: display crashed after a year not able to turn on..
customer_reviews.author: prman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful air purifier LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY AIR PURIFIER LIVING IN THE LOWER LEVEL HALF UNDER GRADE IT TENDS TO GET MUSTY AND HAVING MY LITTLE DOG WITH HIS ACCIDENTS. THIS REALLY DOES AN EXCELLENT JOB CLEANING THE AIR. IVE SHARED THIS WITH A FEW OF MY FRIENDS
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly and thoroughly the Green Air Pro removed pet odors from my home., I had also left my sunroof open in my car and the upholstery had a strong musty odor, to the point where it was undriveable. I put the Green Air Pro in overnight and the odor was virtually gone. After a second treatment, it was completely gone. Buy this product with complete confidence!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: It worked really well but only for a short time ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well but only for a short time. For the money not worth it. I had it repaired 1 year after i bought it. It worked for 6 months after that and then could not be fixed. Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running over a year now non stop,  no problems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it March of 2016, it's now May of 2017. I've not turned it off other than to blow it with the aircompressor twice. This purifier is a beast, and cleans my master bedroom perfectly. I run it normally without the Anion, Sterilizer or Purifier, and when I want the room really fresh I just use those features and it's like a rain storm came in. What more could you want, it's not cheap but it's a work horse and does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Oakweb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My oldest child had the flu (dr tested) and slept in the living room for 3 days so I could take care of them easily. That’s also the room where we have this ozone machine running. Nobody else in our family contracted the flu. I think that speaks volumes. We also have a mini-Rescue shelter in our home and you cannot smell anything animal related at all. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: The mominator

customer_reviews.title: Cant tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about this unit. It was easy to set up and seems to work. However after over two weeks of running in my living room I dont notice any difference. The filter isn't dirty at all. We live in a dusty drafty 120 year old farm house and own three large dogs. The filter should have some trace of dirt on it. We have a different filter in out bedroom and I can smell the difference in that room. It's really impossible for me to say if the unit is working at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'v been looking to buy one of these for a while now since we use very similar models at work all the time. This one is better having a UV light built in as well. Ran it on low all night with just the air purifier/sanitizer on and noticed the difference in air quality when we woke up this morning. Will set it up to run the ozone for a an hour or so while at work over the next few days and see what that does.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellington

customer_reviews.title: 4 days w/o power, Irma you know! Had this unit connected to solar set up, worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What difference...11 pets...excellent shipping, easy to start, I goofed by not reading simple instructions.see()'s. Called and someone actually answered the phone, (spoke English).Dissapointed it's made in China, probably could not afford unit otherwise. Been running 72 hours straight the whole house is clean air. Great white noise for sleeping! Breathing very well, fewer sinus problems...yeh!
customer_reviews.author: Ken bAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work to be used in small office spaces that are occupied 24/7 removed all odors and has reduced the amount of dust tremendously. So then I got one for the house. Great filter removes all types of airborne pollutants.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this little guy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little guy! I have a bigger Blue Air cleaner unit $600) but this puppy does the same job if not better. I mostly bought for the purifying feature to make my place smell fresh again....especially after cooking. I dislike the smell of food in the house when I wake up in the morning. I've got 2 King Charles pups and it also helps with dust/dander on the cleaning function.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier for the money
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier worked well to remove toxic smell of insecticide from a rug. I used the ozone purifier for a few hours and the smell was gone. Great customer service by the seller as well. Over the phone he guided me with the set up very patiently. He also answered all of my questions about operation etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Irene

customer_reviews.title: Fast Response! Very Professional
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Air Pro 2 and installed the filters and plates with no issues. Documentation was good, but more photos in manual would help. Unit works great. Wrote 2 emails to company and both were responded to in just a few hours answering my questions on square footage of coverage (3000-3500) and warranty (2 years). Now if only the unit cleans up my damp and mildewed basement as is advertised, it will deserve the 5 star rating. I am optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I have had this air cleaner for years.
customer_reviews.text: I use this air cleaner everyday and really enjoy it. It works great. I have changed the filters multiple times. It is easy. I rarely need the ozone feature, but when I use it it takes out smells with ease. The house has that post lightning smell. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Issue with UV light got resolved very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I started using my green air pro about a month ago and my UV light went out. Got the contact for the company and they are replacing it right away. I bought it because my kids have many allergies and we had just painted their room. The filter is also a little louder than I thought it would be for a small room. It's nice, compact and seems to be doing the job quite well. Will purchase another one for a trip overseas!
customer_reviews.author: Delicate Belly

product_meta.title: Green Air Pro 2 Plate HEPA Alpine Air Purifier Ozone Generator
product_meta.description: Working in conjunction with its triple filter system, the air purifier pulls in unclean air from the rear passing it through the Pre-filter, HEPA filter, and finally the Photo Catalytic (PCO) filter. These filters are able to capture airborne contaminants as small as 0.3 microns. Only Green Air Pro features this triple air filter system, making the air in your home wonderfully clean. The anion emitters, now moved forward of the fan to the front panel, release trillions of negative ions into your home, attaching themselves to dust particles, and dropping them straight to the floor. This advanced function is ideal for eliminating dust, animal dander, and other particles that float in the air. Left behind is fresh oxygen rich air. Green Air Pro also features a UV lamp. When you need to eliminate strong or offensive odors in your home, the Purifier mode creates activated oxygen (ozone) based upon the square footage of your home. Perfect for eliminating tobacco smoke odors, cooking odors, chemical/cleaning agent odors, paint odors, etc. The activated oxygen will also eradicate pollution embedded in walls, ceilings, floors, carpets, furniture, clothing, countertops....all surfaces in your home. Use Purifier mode (ozone function) when home is unoccupied on units built in timer. Ozone reverts back to oxygen after approx. 30 to 45 minutes. Ozone generation: 360mg/hr per plate. Return home to fresh, clean, oxygen rich air, provided only by the 4 advanced technologies of the Green Air Pro Digital Air Purifier!!
feature_bullets: NOW COMES WITH AND USES TWO PURIFIER PLATES FOR TWICE THE PURIFICATION POWER, ODOR REMOVAL
Large Backlit LCD Display, Covers up to 3500 sq.ft.
Ozone Timer: 30 mins up to 3 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars232 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
